name: Seated Cable Row -High Row , Upper Back Focus
details: Pulling the handle towards the upper chest shifts focus to the upper back and traps.

name: Seated Cable Row (Close Grip _ Squeeze Row)
details: Keeping elbows close and squeezing shoulder blades works the middle back thickness.

name: Dumbbell Wrist Curl (Palms Up)
details: Seated position with forearm resting on thigh, curling dumbbell upward with palm facing up to strengthen wrist flexors.

name: Dumbbell Reverse Wrist Curl (Palms Down)
details: Similar to wrist curl but with palms facing down to target the wrist extensors.

name: Dumbbell Hammer Curl (Forearm Emphasis)
details: Performed with a neutral grip to emphasize the brachioradialis along with biceps and brachialis.

name: Dumbbell Wrist Rotation (Pronation & Supination)
details: Rotating the dumbbell works pronation and supination control, improving grip stability and forearm strength.

name: Dumbbell Farmer’s Carry / Hold
details: Holding dumbbells at the side trains grip endurance and overall forearm strength isometrically.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
details: Performed seated or standing, pressing dumbbells overhead to target the front and side delts.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise sitting
details: Raising dumbbells to the side at shoulder height to isolate the lateral delts for width.

name: Dumbbell Front Raise
details: Lifting dumbbells in front of the body to shoulder height, focusing on the anterior delts.

name: Dumbbell Rear Delt Fly (Bent-over Lateral Raise)
details: Performed bent-over with dumbbells, raising arms laterally to isolate the rear delts and upper back.

name: Machine Chest Fly (Pec Deck)
details: Performed on the pec deck machine, bringing arms together in a hugging motion to isolate the chest muscles.

name: Band Front Raise (Resistance Band)
details: Performed standing with a resistance band, raising arms forward to shoulder height. Focuses on chest activation with shoulder support.

name: Wall Shoulder Flexion (Wall Slide)
details: Performed standing against a wall, sliding arms upward to improve shoulder mobility and stability while engaging chest and serratus.

name: Hip Flexor Stretch (Half-Kneeling Lunge Stretch)
details: Performed in a lunge position, pushing hips forward to stretch the hip flexors and quads.

name: Glute Bridge
details: Performed lying on the back with knees bent, lifting hips upward to engage glutes and hamstrings while stabilizing the core.

name: Barbell Back Squat
details: Performed with a barbell resting on the upper back, squatting down and standing up to target the quads, glutes, and hamstrings. A fundamental compound lower-body strength exercise.

name: Smith Machine Overhead Press
details: Performed standing or seated with the Smith machine, pressing the bar overhead to build shoulder strength and size.

name: Smith Machine Front Raise
details: Performed by raising the Smith machine bar from thighs to shoulder height, isolating the front delts.

name: Smith Machine Bent-Over Rear Delt Row
details: Performed bent over, pulling the Smith machine bar towards the upper stomach or chest to emphasize the rear delts and upper back.

name: Leg Extension (Machine)
details: Performed seated on the machine, extending the knees against resistance to isolate the quadriceps.

name: Standing Leg Curl (Machine)
details: Performed standing with ankle pad, curling the leg backward to isolate the hamstrings.

name: Machine Hip Thrust / Glute Extension
details: Performed with back supported on a bench and machine pad across the hips, thrusting upwards to target glutes.

name: Seated Calf Raise (Machine)
details: Performed seated with resistance on the thighs, raising heels upward to strengthen calves with emphasis on the soleus.

name: Machine Crunch (Abdominal Crunch Machine)
details: Performed seated on the ab machine, flexing the spine forward against resistance to target the abdominals.

name: Dumbbell Shrug
details: Performed standing with dumbbells at the sides, shrugging shoulders upward to target the upper traps.

name: Dumbbell Upright Row
details: Performed standing with dumbbells, pulling them upward along the body to shoulder height, engaging traps and delts.

name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift (RDL)
details: Performed with a hip hinge, lowering dumbbells to shin level with a flat back, emphasizing hamstrings and glutes.

name: Dumbbell Deadlift
details: Performed from the floor with dumbbells, standing up through leg drive and hip extension, targeting the entire posterior chain.

name: Dumbbell Skull Crushers
details: Performed lying on a bench with dumbbells, lowering them towards the forehead and extending arms back up to target triceps.
primary_muscles_worked: Triceps brachii (long head, lateral head, medial head)

name: Barbell Skull Crushers (EZ Bar or Straight Bar)
details: Performed lying on a bench with a barbell, lowering it towards the forehead and extending arms to isolate the triceps.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdown (Overhand Grip)
details: Performed standing with a cable machine, pushing the bar downward with an overhand grip to engage the triceps.

name: Cable Overhead Tricep Extension
details: Performed standing with a cable machine, holding the bar overhead and extending arms upward to target the long head of the triceps.

name: Cable Crossover (High to Low)
details: Performed by pulling the cables from a high position downward and across the body, targeting the lower chest.

name: Cable Crossover (Low to High)
details: Performed by pulling the cables from a low position upward and across the body, emphasizing the upper chest.

name: Cable Crossover (Mid-Level / Standard)
details: Performed by pulling the cables from shoulder height directly across the body, targeting the mid chest.

name: Cable Straight Arm Pulldown
details: Performed by pulling the bar down with straight arms from shoulder height to thighs, isolating the lats.

name: Cable Bent-Over Row (Overhand Grip)
details: Performed bent over with an overhand grip, pulling the bar towards the abdomen to target the mid-back.

name: Cable Upright Row
details: Performed standing with the cable bar, pulling it vertically along the body to chin height, engaging traps and shoulders.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
details: Performed standing with dumbbells, curling weights upward to shoulder level to isolate the biceps.

name: Dumbbell One-Arm Overhead Tricep Extension
details: Performed standing with one dumbbell held overhead, lowering behind the head and extending back up to target the triceps long head.

name: Dumbbell Bent-Over Row
details: Performed bent over with dumbbells, pulling weights towards the torso to strengthen the mid-back.

name: Dumbbell Pull Over
details: Performed lying on a flat bench with dumbbells, pressing weights upward to target chest while engaging shoulders and triceps.

name: Dumbbell Bent-Over Row Kik back
details: Performed bent over with dumbbells, pulling weights towards the torso to strengthen the lats and upper back.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
details: Performed standing with dumbbells, raising arms to the sides until parallel to the floor to target lateral shoulders.

name: Barbell Bent-Over Row
details: Performed bent over with a barbell, pulling it towards the torso to build overall back thickness and strength.

name: Lat Pulldown (Wide Grip)
details: Performed seated with a wide grip on the bar, pulling down toward the upper chest to emphasize the outer lats.

name: Lat Pulldown (Close Grip)
details: Performed with a narrow/close grip, pulling the bar down toward the chest to emphasize inner lats and rhomboids.

name: Lat Pulldown (Behind the Neck Variation)
details: Performed by pulling the bar behind the neck, placing greater emphasis on the rear delts and traps along with the lats.

name: Machine Reverse Grip Pulldown
details: Performed with an underhand grip on the machine pulldown bar, emphasizing the lower lat fibers.

name: V-Bar Pulldown
details: Performed using a V-bar attachment, pulling it down to the chest to build overall lat width and mid-back thickness.

name: Dumbbell Chest Press Sleep
details: Flat bench dumbbell press performed lying on the bench to target overall chest strength.

name: Dumbbell Chest Fly Sleep
details: Flat bench dumbbell fly focusing on chest adduction and stretch in the pectorals.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press Sleep
details: Incline bench dumbbell press performed lying on an incline to emphasize the upper chest.

name: Flat Dumbbell Press Sleep
details: Flat bench dumbbell press variant performed lying flat to target overall pectoral development.

name: Decline Dumbbell Press Sleep
details: Decline bench dumbbell press performed lying on a decline to emphasize the lower chest.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
details: Flat bench dumbbell press to build overall chest strength.

name: Dumbbell Biceps Curl
details: Standing curl with dumbbells to isolate the biceps.

name: Leg Raise Lower Abs
details: Supine leg raises to emphasize the lower abdominals.

name: Crunch Upper Abs
details: Floor crunch focusing on upper abdominal contraction.

name: Flutter Kicks Full Abs
details: Alternating leg kicks while supine to engage full abs.

name: Bicycle Crunch Full Abs
details: Alternating elbow-to-knee rotation to target full abs and obliques.

name: Side Plank Obliques
details: Side plank hold to strengthen the obliques and lateral core.

name: Barbell Romanian Deadlift
details: Hip-hinge lowering the bar along thighs/shins to emphasize hamstrings and glutes.

name: Smith Machine Squat
details: Guided bar squat focusing on quad and glute development.

name: Smith Machine Deadlift
details: Deadlift pattern on Smith machine to load glutes and hamstrings with added stability.

name: Smith Machine Squat (Glutes & Hamstrings)
details: Wide-stance or hip-dominant Smith squat emphasizing posterior chain.

name: Barbell Row (Lats Focus)
details: Hinge and row the bar to lower ribs, keeping elbows tight to emphasize the lats.

name: Barbell Row (Rhomboids Focus)
details: Row the bar to mid-chest/upper abdomen with flared elbows to hit rhomboids and mid-traps.

name: Upright Barbell Row (Traps Focus)
details: Pull bar vertically along torso to upper chest focusing on upper traps.

name: Leg Press - Quads Focus
details: Feet low/narrow on the platform to emphasize quadriceps.

name: Leg Press - Adductors Focus
details: Feet wider and toes slightly out to hit inner thighs.

name: Leg Press - Glutes & Hamstrings
details: Feet higher on the platform to bias glutes and hamstrings.

name: Barbell Squat
details: Stand with bar across shoulders; squat until thighs parallel, then drive up.

name: Dumbbell Row (Lats Focus)
details: Hinge and row dumbbells toward lower ribs, elbows tucked.

name: Dumbbell Row (Traps Focus)
details: Hinge and row higher toward chest with flared elbows to bias traps.

name: Dumbbell Row (Rear Delt Focus)
details: Leaning forward, pull dumbbells outward with slight elbow bend to hit rear delts.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press (Deltoids Focus)
details: Press dumbbells overhead from shoulder height; control down.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
details: Raise dumbbells laterally to shoulder height; slight elbow bend.

name: Barbell Upright Row
details: Pull bar along torso to chest level; keep wrists neutral.

name: Barbell Overhead Press (Shoulder Press)
details: Press barbell overhead from clavicle height to lockout.

name: Machine Reverse Fly (Rear Delt Fly Machine)
details: Seated reverse pec-deck to isolate rear delts.

name: Dumbbell Overhead Triceps Extension
details: Lower one/both dumbbells behind head and extend to work triceps.

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
details: Bench-supported row pulling dumbbell to hip.

name: Dumbbell Kickback
details: Extend elbow fully with upper arm parallel to torso.

name: Bench Triceps Dip
details: Hands on bench behind you; lower and press up to engage triceps.

name: Romanian Deadlift (RDL)
details: Hip hinge with slight knee bend; slide bar/dumbbells down thighs and return.

name: Pull-Up (Wide Grip)
details: Wide overhand pull to bring chin above bar; emphasize lats and upper back.

name: Pull-Up (Close Grip, Overhand)
details: Narrow overhand pull-up to bias rhomboids and mid/lower traps.

name: Chin-Up (Underhand Grip)
details: Underhand pull-up emphasizing biceps while engaging lats.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
details: Incline bench curl for deeper stretch and peak tension on biceps.

name: Incline Dumbbell Hammer Curl
details: Neutral-grip incline curls to bias brachialis and brachioradialis.

name: Incline Dumbbell Reverse Curl
details: Overhand-grip incline curl to target forearm extensors and brachioradialis.

name: Stiff-Leg Deadlift
details: Deadlift with minimal knee bend to emphasize hamstrings stretch.

name: Conventional Deadlift
details: Floor pull using hip and knee extension; balanced posterior/anterior chain.

name: Goblet Squat
details: Hold a dumbbell/kettlebell at chest; squat upright to depth.

name: Sumo Squat (Dumbbell Sumo Squat)
details: Wide-stance squat holding a dumbbell between legs; toes turned out.

name: Dumbbell Wide Stance Squat
details: Wider-than-shoulder stance squat holding a dumbbell.

name: Dumbbell Deadlift
details: Deadlift pattern with dumbbells in front of thighs; hinge and stand tall.

name: Dumbbell Front Raise Standing
details: Raise dumbbells straight forward to shoulder height.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise Standing
details: Lift arms to sides until shoulder height; control down.

name: Dumbbell Rear Delt Raise (Bent-Over Lateral Raise) Standing
details: Bent-over reverse fly to isolate rear delts.

name: Seated Cable Row (Close Grip)
details: Close-grip row pulling handle to torso for mid-back thickness.

name: Seated Cable Row (Wide Grip)
details: Wide-bar row to upper abdomen/chest emphasizing mid-back and traps.

name: Face Pull (Cable Rope Pull to Face)
details: Rope to face with elbows high to train rear delts and external rotation.

name: Smith Machine Shoulder Press
details: Seated press on Smith machine; stable path to isolate delts.

name: Cable Biceps Curl
details: Low pulley curl with straight/EZ bar; constant cable tension.

name: Cable Reverse Curl
details: Overhand-grip cable curl to target forearm extensors and brachioradialis.

name: Cable Triceps Pushdown (Rope Attachment)
details: High-pulley rope pushdown emphasizing triceps lockout.

name: Wide-Grip Lat Pulldown (Front)
details: Wide overhand pulldown to upper chest to build lat width.

name: V-Grip Lat Pulldown (Close Grip)
details: Close-grip/V-handle pulldown emphasizing mid-back thickness.

name: Reverse-Grip Lat Pulldown (Underhand)
details: Underhand pulldown shifting more load to biceps while engaging lats.

name: Leg Press (High Foot Placement)
details: Feet high on platform to bias glutes and hamstrings.

name: Leg Press (Low Foot Placement)
details: Feet low on platform to increase quadriceps activation.

name: Leg Press (Wide Stance)
details: Wide stance with toes slightly out to target adductors and inner thighs.

name: Dumbbell Overhead Triceps Extension 2
details: Two-hand dumbbell overhead extension; keep elbows tucked.

name: Dumbbell Triceps Kickback
details: Bench-supported kickback isolating the triceps; strict elbow extension.

name: Cable Triceps Pushdown (Straight Bar)
details: High-pulley straight bar pushdown; elbows pinned to sides.

name: Crunches
details: Floor crunch curling shoulders toward pelvis; focus on upper abs.

name: Leg Raises lower abs
details: Supine straight-leg raises emphasizing lower abs.

name: Knee-Tap Crunches
details: Crunch with knees raised; tap knees to combine upper/lower ab engagement.

name: Side Crunches
details: Side-focused crunch lifting torso diagonally toward hip.

name: Russian Twists
details: Seated torso rotations holding weight or bodyweight only.

name: Bicycle Crunches
details: Alternating elbow-to-opposite-knee in a pedaling motion.

name: Lat Pullover
details: Machine pullover pulling lever/bar in an arc to isolate lats.

name: Leg Extension (Machine)
details: Seated knee extension to isolate quadriceps.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
details: Incline bench press with dumbbells emphasizing upper chest.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise 2
details: Lateral raise to shoulder height targeting side delts.

name: Cable Straight Arm Pulldown 2
details: Straight-arm pulldown to engage lats without elbow flexion.

name: Seated Machine Rear Delt Fly
details: Reverse fly on machine focusing on rear delts and upper back.

name: Seated Row (Dumbbell or Machine)
details: Seated pull to torso engaging lats and mid-back.

name: Seated Row (Close Grip / Machine)
details: Close-grip machine row to target inner back and mid-back thickness.

name: Seated Row (Wide Grip / Machine)
details: Wide-grip machine row emphasizing upper back and shoulders.

name: Seated Row (Rear Delt Focus)
details: Row with elbows flared to isolate rear delts while engaging traps/rhomboids.

name: Barbell Row (Bent-Over Row)
details: Bent-over barbell row to abdomen for overall back mass.

name: Barbell Deadlift
details: Lift bar from floor to hip level engaging the entire posterior chain.

name: Plank Hold (Forearm/High Plank)
details: Hold a straight-line plank on forearms or palms.

name: Standard Push-Ups
details: Classic push-up: lower chest to floor and press up.

name: Wide Push-Ups
details: Hands wider than shoulders to emphasize chest.

name: Decline Push-Ups
details: Feet elevated to bias upper chest and shoulders.

name: Incline Push-Ups
details: Hands elevated; easier variation focusing lower chest.

name: Hold Push-Ups (Isometric Hold)
details: Push-up with static hold at bottom or midpoint.

name: Incline Bar Press
details: Incline bar/DB press emphasizing upper chest.

name: Bench Bar Press Flat
details: Flat barbell press for overall chest strength.

name: Preacher Curl (EZ Bar)
details: Preacher bench curl with EZ bar to isolate biceps.

name: Leg Extension (Machine) 2
details: Leg extension machine to isolate quadriceps.

name: Leg Press (Machine)
details: Press weight with feet to work quads and glutes.

name: One-Arm Dumbbell Row
details: Bench-supported one-arm row to engage lats and mid-back.

name: Barbell Wrist Curl (Overhand)
details: Overhand wrist curls to target forearm extensors.

name: Barbell Wrist Curl (Underhand)
details: Underhand wrist curls to target forearm flexors.

name: Reverse Barbell Curl (Behind the Back)
details: Bar held behind body with overhand grip; curl to hit forearm extensors.

name: Machine Chest Fly (Pec Deck) Correctly
details: Pec deck fly bringing arms together in hugging motion.

name: Concentration Curl Biceps brachii
details: Seated concentration curl with elbow braced on inner thigh.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl (long head)
details: Incline bench curl emphasizing the long head stretch.

name: Preacher Curl
details: Preacher bench curl minimizing momentum to hit lower biceps.

name: Seated Dumbbell Curl
details: Seated bilateral dumbbell curl for overall biceps mass.

name: Smith Machine Squat Correctly
details: Smith squat focusing on quads/glutes; keep knees tracking toes.

name: EZ Bar Skull Crushers
details: Lying EZ-bar triceps extensions to forehead then extend.

name: Inverted Row (Overhand Grip)
details: Bodyweight row with overhand grip targeting mid-upper back.

name: Inverted Row (Underhand Grip)
details: Underhand bodyweight row emphasizing lats and lower traps.

name: Inverted Row (Neutral Grip)
details: Neutral grip row variant engaging lats and arms.

name: Barbell Wrist Curl (Overhand Grip)
details: Seated overhand wrist curls for forearm extensors.

name: Barbell Wrist Curl (Underhand Grip)
details: Seated underhand wrist curls for forearm flexors.

name: Dumbbell Reverse Curl Forearms
details: Overhand dumbbell curl emphasizing brachioradialis and extensors.

name: Back Extension (Hyperextension)
details: Hip-hinge on hyperextension bench to strengthen lower back.

name: Barbell Curl Biceps
details: Standing barbell curls to build biceps strength.

name: Cable Reverse Curl Biceps
details: Overhand cable curl focusing on brachioradialis and forearms.

name: Cable Side Lateral Raise
details: Cable lateral raise isolating the side deltoids.

name: Barbell Deadlift Correctly
details: Conventional deadlift with correct form for posterior chain and grip.

name: Seated Overhead Dumbbell Triceps Extension
details: Seated overhead extension targeting triceps; elbows stay close.

name: Dumbbell Chest Fly
details: Flat bench dumbbell fly in a wide arc to isolate chest.

name: Parallel Bar Dips (Triceps Focus)
details: Upright torso dips emphasizing elbow extension.

name: Parallel Bar Dips (Chest Focus)
details: Forward-lean dips to bias lower chest fibers.

name: Pseudo Planche Push-Up
details: Hands set low near waist; advanced push-up emphasizing chest/shoulders.

name: Archer Push-Up Chest (unilateral focus)
details: One arm bends while other stays extended for unilateral chest load.

name: Triceps Extension (Bodyweight / Lying)
details: Bodyweight triceps extension from prone position; elbow-driven.

name: Dumbbell Lunge
details: Forward lunge holding dumbbells for leg strength and stability.

name: L-Sit Hold
